title: Cannot Access Variable Declared In Class From HTML Template Angular 2
body:
As your code is now, you are not saving the photos on the controller instance, and there by making it available to the template.

@Component({
  selector: 'my-app',
  template: `
    <div *ngFor="let photo of photos">{{photo.url}}</div>
  `,
})
export class App {
  photos: any[];
  private photosUrl = 'https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/photos';

  constructor(private http: Http) { }

  ngOnInit() {
    this.getPhotos()
  }

  getPhotos() {
    this.http.get(this.photosUrl)
      .map(data => data.json())
      .subscribe(data => {
        this.photos = data;
      });
  }
}
